relationships.evidence_text: Gabe Brown, the author of Dirt to Soil, One Family's Journey into Regenerative Agriculture.
Gabe Brown is one of the pioneers of the current Soil Health Movement.
Gabe is a partner and board member at Regenified.
He is a founding partner in Understanding Ag LLC.
a founder and instructor for the Nonprofit Soil Health Academy.
which focuses on teaching others the power and importance of healthy functioning ecosystems.
he and his wife Shelley founded Brown's Ranch.
a diversified 6,000 acre farming ranch near Bismarck, North Dakota.
which is now managed by their son Paul.
Gabe and the families ranch have received many forms of recognition for their work, including the prestigious Hines Award for the Environment.

approximately from 50 to 75% of the carbon that was once in those soils is not gone it's in the atmosphere very degraded.

relationships.evidence_text: Water is running off the landscape instead of infiltrating into the soil and then being able to be held there stored via the carbon in the soil.
